pathfinding.​ XPS_PF_typ_RoadNode

TypeDefinition

Authors

Crashdome

Description

HashmapObject which represents a road object with extra meta data for pathfinding and navigation

Parent

none

Implements

<XPS_PF_ifc_IRoadNode>

<main. XPS_ifc_IAstarNode>

Flags

none

Properties
BeginPos
get "BeginPos"
Returns
Array

beginning position in ASL

ConnectedTo
get "ConnectedTo"
Returns
Hashmap

contains 4 keys: MAIN ROAD, ROAD, TRACK, and TRAIL. Each holds a Hashmap of key/value pair of connected roads in format ["name",road object]

EndPos
get "EndPos"
Returns
Array

end Position in ASL

IsBridge
get "IsBridge"
Returns
Boolean

true if object is a bridge object

PosASL
get "PosASL"
Returns
Array

position in ASL

Index
get "Index"

<main. XPS_ifc_IAstarNode>

Returns
String

the key used to store this in a XPS_PF_typ_RoadGraph

RoadObject
get "RoadObject"
Returns
Object

the road object associated with this node

Type
get "Type"
Returns
String

the type of road object associated with this node. Can be one of "MAIN ROAD", "ROAD", "TRACK", "TRAIL"

Width
get "Width"
Returns
Number

Width of road object

Methods
#create
_result = createHashmapObject ["XPS_typ_Name",[_var1*,_var2*]]
Optionals
_var1*

Object - (Optional - Default : objNull)

_var2*

String - (Optional - Default : "")

Returns
_result

HashmapObject
